page.title: 17EDUCATION IN OUR AREA
page.content: {Brinsworth Comprehensive School}has a total of{1493 pupils}comprising of { {753 girls and 740 boys.}There are{98 {staff}in all -{87 teachers and 11 non- {teachers. { } The{6th. Form}has a total of{97 {pupils}of whom{45}are{girls}and{52}are {boys. There are six main{'feeder' primary {schools: 3 in Brinsworth (Howarth, {Manor and Whitehill), 2 in Whiston {(Worrygoose and Saville Road) and {Catcliffe.}A few children choose to come to B.C.S. from outside the catchment area. Children from{Treeton}go on to { {Aston Comprehensive School.}The{ {Treeton Junior and Infant School}is different from the others in that it is{aided}by the{Church of England. {
